meanings.definition: A person who delivers a eulogy.
meanings.sent1: During the funeral, the eulogists shared heartfelt memories of the deceased.
meanings.sent2: The eulogists spoke eloquently about the life of the departed.
meanings.sent3: The eulogists made everyone smile with their touching words.
meanings.sent4: The eulogists' words painted a beautiful picture of the person we lost.
meanings.sent5: The eulogists' voices echoed in the somber room, honoring the memory.

meanings.sent1: At the memorial service, the eulogists stood together to honor the deceased.
meanings.sent2: The eulogists' speeches brought comfort to the grieving family.
meanings.sent3: The eulogists' presence added warmth to the solemn occasion.
meanings.sent4: The eulogists' unity symbolized the strength of their shared memories.
meanings.sent5: The eulogists' words intertwined, creating a tapestry of remembrance.
